data.lyric:
[ti:Manta]
[ar:刘柏辛Lexie]
[al:Manta]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]Manta - 刘柏辛Lexie
[00:01.35]词：刘柏辛
[00:02.29]曲：刘柏辛
[00:03.19]音乐总监：Kenn Wu
[00:04.50]制作人：Bijan Amir/CJ Wheeler/Kenn Wu/刘柏辛/Femke Weidema
[00:07.56]合声：刘柏辛
[00:08.74]录音工程师：Kenn Wu/Jet Chong
[00:10.66]混音师：Peter Mixman
[00:11.72]母带工程师：Randy Merrill
[00:13.19]版权公司：刘柏辛工作室/泥鞋文化
[00:20.27]Not a swimming pool It's an ocean
[00:22.81]Dive in that cash like l'm chosen
[00:24.98]That my 24 karat got you frozen ya
[00:27.80]活在不一样的世界又怎样
[00:30.01]He'll be on the surface Lur lurkin'
[00:32.79]Overheated up That gon' make me nervous
[00:35.00]水里呼吸着 扇动不属于我的翅膀
[00:37.86]Lucifer
[00:38.70]别慌这不是我的名字呢
[00:41.23]Now he can start the fishing buy me another-round
[00:44.45]Diamonds on me like I'm fresh outta water
[00:46.95]A Mariner
[00:48.22]Reelin' reelin' me in with that thin line
[00:50.33]Fly underwater
[00:51.61]I don't need no manner
[00:52.84]绝不会干涸的
[00:54.07]我为海洋染色
[00:55.27]Fly underwater
[00:56.55]I don't need no manner
[00:57.82]绝不会干涸的
[00:59.09]我为海洋染色
[01:00.32]Manta
[01:02.55]I fly in water lil Manta
[01:04.72]Devilfish Manta
[01:07.25]Call on me I don't need no romancer
[01:09.99]I fly like a Manta
[01:12.54]I fly in water lil Manta
[01:14.69]Devilfish Manta
[01:17.21]Call on me I don't need no romancer
[01:30.34]Glitter on my skin I'm a shiner
[01:32.50]Got a flight to catch tomorrow back to China
[01:34.98]我的行踪 难以捉摸在哪
[01:37.45]But when I bust it open boy you better swim
[01:40.02]那么危险怎么还要追
[01:42.46]但我没有时间可以浪费
[01:44.97]我从未试过在陆地上飞起来
[01:47.57]I'll be ridin'on a wave drippin' water tonight
[01:50.28]Manta
[01:52.50]I fly in water lil Manta
[01:54.69]Devilfish Manta
[01:57.20]Call on me I don't need no romancer
[02:00.01]I fly like a Manta
[02:02.52]I fly in water lil Manta
[02:04.75]Devilfish Manta
[02:07.20]Call on me I don't need no romancer
[02:11.92]Devilfish
[02:30.32]Fly underwater
[02:31.53]I don't need no manner
[02:32.79]绝不会干涸的
[02:34.03]我为海洋染色
[02:35.31]Fly underwater
